/* eslint-disable no-unused-vars *//* eslint-disable no-unused-expressions */import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import CategoryBtn from'../ProjectFilter/CategoryBtn';import FilterItem from'../ProjectFilter/FilterItem';import projectFilterTwoData from'./projectFilterTwoData';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProjectFilter2(){// STATES
const[category,setCategory]=useState('all');const[filteredItem,setFilteredItem]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{category==='all'?setFilteredItem(projectFilterTwoData):setFilteredItem(projectFilterTwoData.filter(data=>data.category===category));},[category]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"portfolio-wrapper-section section-padding",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-12 col-lg-12 text-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section-title-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Portfolio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Portfolio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Our Case Study"})]})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row mb-20",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-12 col-lg-12 text-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"portfolio-cat-filter",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CategoryBtn,{className:category==='all'?'btn-active':null,name:"all",label:"Veiw All",handleSetCategory:setCategory}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CategoryBtn,{className:category==='bedroom'?'btn-active':null,name:"bedroom",label:"Bedroom Making",handleSetCategory:setCategory}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CategoryBtn,{className:category==='floor'?'btn-active':null,name:"floor",label:"Floor Making",handleSetCategory:setCategory}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CategoryBtn,{className:category==='office'?'btn-active':null,name:"office",label:"Office Making",handleSetCategory:setCategory}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CategoryBtn,{className:category==='home'?'btn-active':null,name:"home",label:"Home Making",handleSetCategory:setCategory})]})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row grid",children:filteredItem.map((item,length)=>length<='3'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FilterItem,{image:item.image,price:item.price,name:item.name,heading:item.heading,category:item.category},item.id))})]})});}export default ProjectFilter2;
